Posted By: New_Flesh (1/22/2013 2:49:48 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Beautiful art, amazing flavor, and an absolute limited bomb. Combos amazingly well with [Alms Beast](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Alms Beast). If you can get just one or two attacks in, the game could be yours. I like the potential behind this card. It feels like it could do well in an aura based deck along with [ethereal armor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=ethereal armor) and removal enchantments.  
  
Plus, I like that it can be played in white decks and black decks, not just b/w.  
  
Awesome card.
posts.html:
Beautiful art, amazing flavor, and an absolute limited bomb. Combos amazingly well with Alms Beast. If you can get just one or two attacks in, the game could be yours. I like the potential behind this card. It feels like it could do well in an aura based deck along with ethereal armor and removal enchantments.

Plus, I like that it can be played in white decks and black decks, not just b/w.

Awesome card.

Posted By: DoragonShinzui (1/30/2013 10:03:29 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I want an Aura-moving card that I can abuse in a way to keep reattaching t  
his to [Obzedat](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Obzedat). ^\_^  
  
Because, you know, making him a 6/6 flying lifelinker that drains you for two before he gains that 6..that sounds like a cool idea. :P  
  
Obzedat enters  
they lose 2 you gain 2  
Obzedat attacks  
they lose 6 you gain 6  
  
o.O  
  
with Crypt Ghast and Deathrite Shaman, can be played on turn FOUR in Standard o.O  
  
T1- Godless Shrine, [Deathrite Shaman](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Deathrite Shaman)  
T2- Swamp, make yourself discard a land  
T3- Godless Shrine, activate Shaman,(4mana), [Crypt Ghast](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Crypt Ghast)  
T4- Swamp, [Obzedat](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Obzedat), [Gift of Orzhova](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Gift of Orzhova). Christ. X.X  
T5- kill them with raping -\_-  
  
While you trade some of Obzedat's greatness to keep the Aura on, you can think of it differently: On Obzedat, Gift of Orzhova essentially has [Totem Armor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Totem Armor)  
That's in STANDARD. Which is why I need to find a way to move around Gift in EDH ^\_^

posts.post_content:
Again and Again, Johannes Voss proves to be my favourite card artist.  
  
[Blood Artist](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Blood Artist), [Dark Imposter](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dark Imposter), [Azor's Elocutors](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Azor's Elocutors), [Havoc Festival](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Havoc Festival), [Angelic Destiny](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Angelic Destiny)... His resume isn't as extensive as John Avon, but... it's all really good.
posts.html:
